CareRequestReviewer.name: CareRequestReviewer
CareRequestReviewer.description: Represents the details of a care request reviewer including name, reviewer type, status of the care request at the end of the review, the reviewer’s notes, and date of review. A care request, care request item, care request drug, or care diagnosis can be associated with a care request reviewer.

CareRequestCaseId.description: The case related to the care request.

CareRequestReferenceId.description: The care request, care request item, care request drug, or care diagnosis associated with the care request reviewer.

ContentDocumentId.description: The content document that's attached to the reviewer note.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name associated with the record.

ReviewDate.description: The date when the care request was reviewed.

ReviewerId.description: The name of the user who reviewed the care request.

ReviewerNotes.description: The notes related to the review.

ReviewerType.description: The type of the reviewer who reviewed the care request.

Status.description: The status of the care request.
